name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building and scaling backend systems, focusing on Java and **Spring Boot** for high-performance API development. Proven expertise in developing REST and GraphQL APIs, and leveraging **GCP** services such as **Cloud Run** and **PubSub**. Extensive background in database management with **MySQL** and **NoSQL** solutions, and proficient in using **Kafka** for messaging. Skilled in version control using **Git** and **GitLab**, and experienced in Agile methodologies to enhance project delivery. Demonstrated success in delivering innovative solutions at top-tier companies, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, while effectively collaborating in fast-paced environments.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered robust backend services utilizing **Java** and **Spring Boot** to optimize document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Developed and implemented RESTful APIs and GraphQL interfaces to enhance system integration and user experience, managing over **1000** API calls daily.
Designed event-driven architectures using **Kafka** and **GCP PubSub** for managing asynchronous processing of financial transactions, enabling real-time data handling with a throughput of **200** messages per second.
Deployed microservices on **GCP Cloud Run** with infrastructure managed through **Git** and **GitLab** repositories, ensuring reliable and efficient cloud operations.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory compliance using **MySQL** and **NoSQL** databases, guaranteeing data accuracy within a **99.9%** uptime.
Led security assessments and integrated secure authentication systems utilizing **OAuth2**, promoting a scalable access control architecture for over **5000** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in accordance with **Agile** methodologies to resolve system integration challenges and oversee deployment strategies in alignment with compliance requirements.

Engineered robust APIs using **Java** and **Spring Boot** to facilitate seamless communication between microservices and frontend components, ensuring scalability in system design.
Developed RESTful and GraphQL services for efficient data retrieval and manipulation, optimizing user experience for over **10,000** daily active users.
Utilized **GCP** services like **Cloud Run** and **PubSub** for deploying applications in a serverless environment, reducing operational costs by **30%** and improving deployment speed by **40%**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git** and **GitLab** for smoother code integration and version control, enhancing team productivity by **25%**.
Designed, developed, and maintained databases using **MySQL** and **NoSQL** solutions, ensuring data consistency and reliability across the application with **99.9%** uptime.
Contributed to Agile methodologies by actively participating in sprint planning and retrospectives, resulting in a **50%** decrease in project cycle time.
Leveraged **Kafka** for real-time data processing and integration of external systems, effectively handling millions of transactions per day.

• Developed robust API endpoints using **Spring Boot** and **REST** frameworks for seamless communication between backend and frontend teams, improving response times by up to **30%**.
• Implemented data management solutions using **MySQL** and **NoSQL** databases to efficiently handle datasets exceeding **1M** records while ensuring data integrity and performance.
• Integrated **GCP** services such as **Cloud Run** and **PubSub** for scalable cloud solutions and real-time data processing, reducing latency in high-volume trade transactions by **25%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to deliver features iteratively, ensuring timely project completions with an **80%** sprint success rate.
• Utilized version control systems like **Git** and **Gitlab** to manage codebase effectively, enabling streamlined collaboration and deployment processes.
• Ensured adherence to best practices in security and regulatory compliance, reducing vulnerabilities and aligning with standards like GDPR and MiFID II.
• Engineered event-driven architectures using **Kafka** for processing high-frequency transactions, ensuring system reliability and scalability under load.
• Conducted thorough unit and integration testing using tools such as **PyTest** to maintain code quality and performance, achieving a test coverage of over **90%**.
